casebody.data:
IN RE Petition for EQUITABLE MODIFICATION OF the COST APPORTIONMENTS FOR the RIVER DELL REGIONAL SCHOOL DISTRICT, Bergen County. (Borough of Oradell - Petitioner) C-261 September Term 2018
081537 Supreme Court of New Jersey. NOVEMBER 8, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005393-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
